name: RadioNeneValley
0:
”Alexa, Northampton Hospital Radio”
”Alexa, Open Northampton Hospital Radio”
”Alexa, Start Northampton Hospital Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: northampton hospital radio
des:
Radio Nene Valley is Northampton's Hospital Radio Station and has been broadcasting to the town's General Hospital for almost 50 years.

We broadcast programmes 24 hours and our programming is available free of charge to the patients of Northampton General hospital via their bedside television units and online via our website.

Our aim is to provide entertainment to patients throughout their stay with requests, dedications and programmes that other radio stations couldn't hope to provide. If Radio Nene Valley can help you raise a smile, feel less isolated at what can be a difficult time or bring a little happiness and comfort to your bedside during your stay, then we think we got what we're doing just about right.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
